wikipedia_page.main: Peter Aldis (11 April 1927 – 17 November 2008) was an English professional footballer who played at full-back and appeared in 294 games for Aston Villa in league and cup.

response: *17 November 2008 – Peter Aldis, 81, former Aston Villa left-back, who spent 12 seasons at Villa Park, and was a member the Villa side that won the 1957 FA Cup.Peter Aldis obituary  Aston Villa official site. Retrieved on 26 November 2008.
* Peter Aldis (1927–2008), footballer who played for Aston Villa
